pcieTrafficCtrlParams Struct Reference

uint32_t enableIntxAssert
 

Detailed Description

PCIe traffic control parameter structure.

These parameters are used to control PCIe Traffic. Pass 1 to enable and 0 to disable the control parameter.

Field Documentation

uint32_t pcieTrafficCtrlParams::enableBusMaster

Enable/Disable Bus Master

uint32_t pcieTrafficCtrlParams::enableIntxAssert

Enable/Disable assertion of Intx

uint32_t pcieTrafficCtrlParams::enableIoSpace

Enable/Disable IO space.

uint32_t pcieTrafficCtrlParams::enableMemSpace

Enable/Disable Mem Space

uint32_t pcieTrafficCtrlParams::enableSerr

Enable/Disable error report by EP to RC
